summary: Two firemen in a burning building get a treasure map - stolen gold church items are hidden in a closed down factory in St. Louis. Once there, they're trapped in by a black gang considering it their territory.
cast: Bill Paxton|Ice-T|William Sadler|Ice Cube|Art Evans|De'voreaux White|Bruce A. Young|Glenn Plummer|Stoney Jackson|T.E. Russell|Tom Lister Jr.|John Toles-Bey|Byron Minns|Tico Wells|Hal Landon Jr.|James Pickens Jr.|L. Warren Young
title: El tiempo de los intrusos
